name: The Make a Neat ZZT Board Contest-Jam Type Thing Compilation
name_original: The Make a Neat ZZT Board Contest-Jam Type Thing Compilation
description:
This ZZT game is a compilation of entries for the 2021 Make a Neat ZZT Board Contest-Jam Type Thing! Contestants were given a few weeks weeks starting in June 2021 to make a single board in ZZT. The 12 people below submitted entries:

allie, LBC, JohnWWells, davidjamesmc, bokonon_lives, Snorb, PSI Ninja, Dog in da Grass, raekuul, Sam, WiL, junk

The entries were then evaluated by the following four judges, who also made boards of their own for fun:

Zinfandel Z.T, KKairos, PogeSoft, Dr. Dos

And then Zinfandel took responsibility for compiling the entries into a single world and struggled with executive dysfunction for several months, until kkairos and WiL of Mean Girls Games lended their hands to help this compilation world get done. Now it's here for you to enjoy, so please enjoy!

To navigate dialogue boxes, press the Up and Down arrows, and press Enter to select an option if one is available or close the window. Press P at the title screen to begin play; the arrow keys move, and holding Shift and then pressing an arrow key will shoot if you have ammo. The S key will let you save your game, and R at the title screen will restore a saved game.
